verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: announced] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARG1: that he would award retired Navy SEAL Britt Slabinski the Medal of Honor for his actions during a 2002 battle in Afgh]
President Donald Trump announced on Monday that he [V: would] award retired Navy SEAL Britt Slabinski the Medal of Honor for his actions during a 2002 battle in Afgh

President Donald Trump announced on Monday that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: would] [V: award] [ARG2: retired Navy SEAL Britt Slabinski] [ARG1: the Medal of Honor] [ARGM-CAU: for his actions during a 2002 battle in Afgh]
President Donald Trump announced on Monday that he would award [V: retired] [ARG0: Navy SEAL Britt Slabinski] the Medal of Honor for his actions during a 2002 battle in Afgh
